name: Ultimate Labyrinths
description:
The game comes in classic wooden frame style with iron ball that rolls based on the smart phone motion. You get to experience the real wooden board based labyrinth experience on your smartphone. This game brings the ultimate experience of the retro version back.

------------------------------------------------------
CHALLENGE ELEMENTS
------------------------------------------------------
* Static Spikes
* Rolling Spike Balls
* Animated Blocks
* Teleport
* Pit Holes
* Wooden Boxes
* Multiple Rolling Balls

-----------------------------------------------------------
GAME PLAY
-----------------------------------------------------------
Move the iron ball to the target hole in the given time to obtain stars. Completing the game before 10 seconds gives 3 stars, before 5 seconds gives 2 stars. Move the iron ball either using phone tilt or swipe controls. 

------------------------------------------------------------
HIGHLIGHTS
------------------------------------------------------------
* Original experience of Classic Wooden board rolling ball mazes.
* 100 breathtaking mazes to play with.
* 25 Achievements to accomplish.
* Every stage to open a new challenging element or combination.
* Every stage to set a challenging time for the levels inside.
* Bonus time is given on watching one time rewarded video for a game level.
* Record the Game play and Share with friends using built in Google Play Services.
* Vulkan Graphics API support makes the game even more better.
* Auto Alert system under low battery.
* Automatic best graphics setting based on device hardware.
* Haptic feedbacks gives reality like feeling of the game.
* Invite friends to play the game using Social Share option.
* 100+ hours of game play fun guaranteed !!! 

All this is absolutely free of cost. Designed with passion and love. 
Why wait? Grab your copy today and enjoy the cool challenges.

Good Luck ;)
